comment: Obsolete version of ~ equsb1v as of 22-Jul-2023. Version of ~ equsb1 with a disjoint variable condition, which neither requires ~ ax-12 nor ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 11-Sep-2019.) Remove dependencies on axioms. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 30-May-2023.) (Proof shortened by Steven Nguyen, 19-Jun-2023.) Revise ~ df-sb . (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 11-Jul-2023.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
